CustomField.description: 1 = New 2 = Existing. Corresponds to Netsuite "Customer Status" list values
CustomField.formula: CASE(Text(Type), "New Business-Enterprise Cloud",1, "New Business - Expansion Portal",2, "Existing Business-Renewal",2, "Existing Business-Upsell",2, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer",2, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer", 2, "Existing Business-Professional Services",2,2)
CustomField.label: Customer Status
